# About Me

Hi! My name is Jayne Campbell and I am currently a fourth year majoring in environmental studies at UCSB. I am very interested and passionate about marine conservation and the ocean and hope to focus on that in my future career.

On this website, you can find some examples of my research projects, past internships, and photography.
